channel.title: Trino data source in 10.0.0-beta.b49597
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm trying to play around with redash and trino locally using docker and after setting them up and running them in docker containers, I get the following error message when trying to create the data source:
Connection Test Failed:
No connection adapters were found for 'https:://localhost:8080/v1/statement' ![image|690x483](upload://hvPEc6FaAzK6Erc0vtlfnktbRlm.png)
Any thoughts what might cause the issue above?
Thank you!

item.title: Trino data source in 10.0.0-beta.b49597
item.dc:creator: data_fool
item.description:
Hello,

I’m trying to play around with redash and trino locally using docker and after setting them up and running them in docker containers, I get the following error message when trying to create the data source:

Connection Test Failed:

No connection adapters were found for ‘https:://localhost:8080/v1/statement’

Any thoughts what might cause the issue above?

Thank you!
